text: A domestic society may enter into reinsurance transactions only in accordance with Chapter 5 of this title. Notwithstanding that law, a society may reinsure the risks of another society in a consolidation or merger approved by the Commissioner under § 31-5311.
historical:

For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-86, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-5301.

DC CODE § 31-5310
